data.title: Frank Miller Presents
data.text:
Previews World Interviews

Frank Miller and Dan Didio take us inside the creative process of Frank Miller Presents. From how to edit, to cultivating new talent, to just the overall craft of making comics. Get ready for a four-part education on how to make comics the Miller way!

Part 1 Interview

Part 2 Interview

Part 3 Interview

Part 4 Interview

View Image Gallery

6/21/2023

FMP Talent Search

As Frank Miller Presents (FMP) nears the first anniversary of its inception, the independent publishing company will be engaging in a nationwide artist talent search. FMP Publisher, Dan DiDio, will be attending comic conventions throughout 2023 with the goal of finding the next best talent.

The portfolio reviews will be mainly for pencilers. Times for the reviews will be arranged with the conventions. Those interested in presenting their work can check the schedule at each respective show.

Read More On FMP

View Image Gallery

3/22/2023

CBR REVIEWS: Frank Miller Presents Djinni

Ancient Enemies has already laid the building blocks for a larger narrative framework. In Ancient Enemies: The Djinni #1—written by Dan DiDio and Kevin VanHook, with artwork from José Luis and Jonas Trindade, colors by Hi-Fi, and lettering by Pete Carlsson—the story explores the origin of Djinni, and how he ended up on Earth.

Available 3/15/2023 at your local comic book store!

Read More On CBR.COM

View Image Gallery

3/6/2023

CBR REVIEWS: Frank Miller Presents Pandora #1

After the release of Ancient Enemies #1 and Ronin: Book Two #1, Frank Miller Presents has another book up its sleeve: Pandora #1. Created by Frank Miller, this YA fantasy series is written by Miller, Anthony Maranville, and Chris Silvestri, drawn and colored by Emma Kubert, and lettered and edited by Pete Carlsson. It’s certainly a much different book than FMP’s other releases to date, leaning into the fantastical for an intriguing beginning to a story.

Available 12/07/2022 at your local comic book store!

Read More On CBR.com

View Image Gallery

12/6/2022

CBR REVIEWS: Frank Miller Presents Ronin: Book Two #1

Celebrated writer Frank Miller has teamed up with former DC publisher Dan DiDio to launch a new comic book publishing company, Frank Miller Presents. One of its first releases is Ronin: Book Two #1, which is written and laid out by Miller, drawn by Philip Tan and Daniel Henriques, and lettered by John Workman. The issue takes readers back into the Ronin universe, which Miller first created in 1983.

Available 11/23/2022 at your local comic book store!

Read More On CBR.com

View Image Gallery

11/22/2022

CBR REVIEWS: Frank Miller Presents Ancient Enemies #1

As one of the founding members of Frank Miller Presents, writer and former DC publisher Dan DiDio is also getting the chance to bring his newest comic book creations to life. Written and edited by DiDio, drawn by Danilo Beyruth, colored by Alex Sinclair, and lettered by Carlos M. Mangual, Ancient Enemies #1 is an explosive new series…

Available 11/23/2022 at your local comic book store!

Read More On CBR.com

View Image Gallery

11/22/2022

FMP Previews Catalog Pages NOV 22

In this catalog, we thank the retailers that supported our ashcan launch in August.

Ancient Enemies Issue 2 of 6

Tensions rise between the two cities, Citadel and Americana, as the recent destruction caused by the alien invaders forces The Wraith to relive painful memories of the past and her first encounter with the creature known as, The Geek!

RONIN: Book II Issue 2 of 6

Following their encounter with the demon Agat, Casey and her child find there are more sinister evils awaiting them in the ravaged landscape of America. Evils that appear to be connected to the original Ronin!

View Image Gallery

11/4/2022

Svengoolie comic books coming in 2023

Svengoolie and MeTV have announced development, with Frank Miller Presents, on full-length comic books starring the iconic horror host himself, Svengoolie. Two comics are set to release in 2023. As if Svengoolie’s Halloween BOOnanza couldn’t get any better, the big announcement was given to fans attending the Svengoolie panel at New York Comic Con.

Svengoolie previously starred in 2019’s Svengoolie Meets the DC Universe, written by Dan DiDio, which featured Svengoolie alongside DC Comics super-heroes Superman, Wonder Woman, as well as…

Read More On metv.com

View Image Gallery

10/12/2022

ANCIENT ENEMIES PANEL

Fri, Oct 7, 2022 / 1:45 PM - 2:45 PM

ROOM 406.1

Special giveaways in each panel while supplies last for the first 300 to arrive. Hope to see you there.

What’s got the comics world buzzing? The new Frank Miller Presents (FMP) line of comics! FMP kicks of their NYCC panels with ANCIENT ENEMIES, a brand spanking new original series! Publisher and ANCIENT ENEMIES writer, Dan DiDio, is joined with stellar series artists Danilo Beyruth and Joe Prado, and the renowned icon himself, Frank Miller, to discuss this launch title everyone will be talking about. There is a ton of exciting things happening at FMP; now is the time to get in on the ground floor!

Read More On newyorkcomiccon.com

View Image Gallery

10/3/2022

RONIN PANEL

Sat, Oct 8, 2022 / 2:15 PM - 3:15 PM

ROOM 401

Special giveaways in each panel while supplies last for the first 300 to arrive. Hope to see you there.

RONIN. You must’ve heard the news by now! This iconic title is coming back with new stories under the Frank Miller Presents banner! Find out more from the sources themselves as Publisher Dan DiDio, artists Philip Tan and Daniel Henriques, and the incomparable legend, Frank Miller, are here to thrill you with news on what’s to come in the RONIN universe! Not to be missed! Attendees will be treated to an exclusive collectible, while supplies last!.

Read More On newyorkcomiccon.com

View Image Gallery

10/3/2022

PANDORA PANEL

Sun, Oct 9, 2022 / 10:30 AM - 11:30 AM

ROOM 408

Special giveaways in each panel while supplies last for the first 300 to arrive. Hope to see you there.

From brand-new publisher, Frank Miller Presents (FMP), comes a new, original YA fantasy series, PANDORA - a dark take on fairy tales as imagined by the legend himself, Frank Miller! Pandora follows the story of Annabeth, a young girl who is unfulfilled in her life, and she is searching for more. For you, the fan, the search is over! Come join FMP CEO Frank Miller, FMP COO Silenn Thomas, Publisher Dan DiDio, and series artist, Emma Kubert, and Anthony Maranville on this return to the original grimness of fairy tales!

Read More On newyorkcomiccon.com

View Image Gallery

10/3/2022

Frank Miller Explains How Comics and Movies Convey Emotion Differently

Miller spoke with CBR at San Diego ComicCon 2022, discussing his thoughts on the strengths of the artistic forms. “Comics are a very good medium for expressing intense emotion,” Miller said. “They’re really best at expressing more intense and melodramatic emotion. They’re better at that than they are at the more subtle emotions. In that arena, prose fiction is so much better. And cinema is so much better. There’s nothing like a real actor’s face to break your heart or draw you in and so on.”

Read More On CBR

View Image Gallery

8/2/2022

SDCC: Frank Miller Reflects on his Legacy & his Future

Writer and artist Frank Miller is one of the comic medium’s most important creators. Entering the industry at the tail end of the 1970s, Miller’s meteoric rise to fame saw him help reinvent Daredevil into one of Marvel’s most complex heroes. His work on Batman with stories like Batman: Year One and The Dark Knight Returns continue to define the character decades later. But Miller’s creator-owned work is just as influential. Stories like 300, Sin City, Ronin, and Martha Washington have inspired legions of other creators.

Read More On CBR

View Image Gallery

7/26/2022
